member.name: T:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.SoapPT.SoapPTAdapter
member.summary: Represents the adapter service used to perform pass-through queries against Web services.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.SoapPT.SoapPTAdapter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.SoapPT.SoapPTAdapter.c_szVersionEncodingEnd
member.summary: Specifies the end of a processing instruction.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.SoapPT.SoapPTAdapter.c_szVersionEncodingScheme
member.summary: Specifies a complete processing instruction that includes utf-8 encoding.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.SoapPT.SoapPTAdapter.c_szVersionEncodingStart
member.summary: Specifies the start of a processing instruction.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.SoapPT.SoapPTAdapter.Query(Microsoft.SharePoint.Dsp.QueryRequest)
member.summary: Executes a query expressed as a predefined request object.
member.returns: A object that contains the data in response to the request query.
member.param: A object that expresses a query in DSPQ (data retrieval service query) or Pass-Through format.
